original_text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow.
korean_text: 그가 병들어 죽게 되었으나 하나님이 그를 긍휼히 여기셨고 그뿐 아니라 또 나를 긍휼히 여기사 내 근심 위에 근심을 면하게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 실로 거의 죽을 지경으로 병들었습니다

sentences.original_text: but God had mercy on him
lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 근심 위에 근심을 겪지 않게 하시려고
